channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Kathleen Kennedy Says Rian Johnson Was ‘Spooked’ From His ‘Star Wars’ Return
item.description: Speaking as she departs as Lucasfilm president, Kennedy didn't outright confirm Johnson's potential trilogy of films was truly dead—but suggested the 'Last Jedi' backlash pushed the director away for the forseeable future.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : les PC portables bureautiques et gaming se plient en deux pour proposer les meilleurs prix !
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 ont démarré depuis plus d'une semaine et on trouve de très belles offres, notamment du côté des PC portables. Que vous chercher une machine pour faire tourner vos jeux AAA ou d'un laptop ultrafin et performant pour bosser, vous devriez trouver votre bonheur dans cette sélection.

item.title: Le MacBook Pro avec écran Oled arriverait plus tôt que prévu
item.description: La production des dalles OLED pour les futurs MacBook Pro aurait pris de l'avance, promettant une machine radicalement nouvelle dès cette année.

item.title: 5 income streams you can add to your website right now
item.description: Discover five practical ways to monetize your website using built-in tools from popular website builders like Wix, Hostinger, and WordPress.

item.title: The key to the UK's AI success lies in closing the skills gap
item.description: The UK’s ambition to become a global AI superpower is being stifled by a widening skills gap.

item.title: La crise de la RAM fait bondir les ventes de PC, mais ça ne va clairement pas durer
item.description: L'année 2025 se termine bien pour les revendeurs de PC avec une belle augmentation des ventes.

item.title: I tested the ProtoArc Flexer Pro - a comfortable office chair with lumbar support that's going to be divisive
item.description: A classic ergonomic office chair with a surprisingly comfortable price tag.

item.title: "It does look like a giant donut": IKEA's latest Varmblixt smart light is a viral sensation, but it's not the only show-stopping product coming in 2026
item.description: As discussed on the TechRadar Podcast it's clear that IKEA was the big winner of CES 2026.

item.title: AMD pourrait transformer ses processeurs Ryzen avec cette nouvelle technologie
item.description: AMD prépare peut‑être la prochaine grosse évolution de ses processeurs Ryzen X3D. Un nouveau brevet laisse entendre que la célèbre 3D V‑Cache pourrait aller encore plus loin, avec une hiérarchie de cache repensée pour gagner en puissance et en efficacité.

item.title: Italy investigates Activision Blizzard for pushing in-game purchases
item.description: Italy has launched two investigations into Microsoft's Activision Blizzard, alleging the company has engaged in "misleading and aggressive" sales practices for two of its most popular smartphone games.

item.title: Fuite de données au Service Public : 160 000 documents administratifs ont été piratés, c’est officiel
item.description: Service-public.gouv.fr, le portail pour les démarches administratives en ligne, vient d’être victime d'une fuite de données. Suite à un incident chez un sous-traitant, des identifiants et des documents sensibles ont été compromis.

item.title: This 3D-scanned insole is another example of placebo tech
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. I take my feet seriously. Which […]

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, January 17 (game #1454)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Saturday, January 17 (game #951)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Saturday, January 17 (game #685)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, HBO Max, Disney+ and more this weekend (January 16)
item.description: From the next Game of Thrones show to that divisive Stranger Things docufilm, here's what's worth watching this weekend.

item.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 8 reveals the most distressing gladiator death in the Starz show to date — and its cast 'felt completely shaken' after filming
item.description: The final scene of a Spartacus: House of Ashur episode is always a shocker, but episode 8 is the most deeply upsetting yet... even for its cast.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Why did Apple choose Gemini for next-gen Siri?
item.description: Apple's next-gen Siri is still far off, but this week the company announced that it'll be using Google's Gemini AI for its new foundation models. In this episode, Devindra and Engadget's Igor Bonifacic discuss why Apple teamed up with Google again, instead of OpenAI or Anthropic. Also, they chat about Meta's Reality Lab layoffs, which is refocusing the company on AI hardware like its smart glasses.Subscribe!iTunesSpotifyPocket CastsStitcherGoogle PodcastsTopicsMeta announces 1000+ layoffs, closes 3 VR studios as it shifts focus to AI hardware – 2:12Gemini can now pull context from the rest of ...

item.title: Le prix du Google Pixel 9 Pro XL fond comme neige au soleil pendant les soldes (-40 %)
item.description: C'est une belle affaire des soldes sur Boulanger, pendant laquelle le Google Pixel 9 Pro XL chute à seulement 729 euros alors qu'il en valait 1 199 euros à son lancement en 2024.

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures voitures électriques en 2026 ? Notre comparatif complet
item.description: Les véhicules électriques sont devenus de véritables alternatives aux véhicules thermiques. Que ce soit une citadine, un SUV ou une berline, nous avons choisi les meilleures voitures électriques que la rédaction de Frandroid et de Survoltés ont pu tester.

item.title: China’s Proposed Megaconstellations Would Flood Orbit With 200,000 Satellites
item.description: Around 12,000 satellites are active in orbit today, most of them operated by SpaceX.

item.title: Get $100 off Apple's Mac mini M4 desktop
item.description: The holiday season is fully in the rear view mirror and real life is here to stay. But that doesn't mean the time for gifts is over — especially ones for yourself. You can still take advantage of great January sales on some awesome tech products. Take the Apple Mac mini M4, which is down to $500 from $599. The 17 percent discount gives you 16GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD for only about $20 more than the computer's Black Friday sale. Its beefier models are also on sale: opting for 512GB of SSD will cost you $690, down from $799, while also upping your RAM to 24GB is available for $890, dropping fr...

item.title: Google a une très bonne idée pour prolonger la durée de vie des smartphones pliables
item.description: Google réfléchit à un moyen de rendre les appareils pliables plus faciles à réparer sur un point fondamental.

item.title: Spotify just announced another price hike. Here’s what’s really driving it
item.description: The streaming giant is lifting Premium prices again—but the context matters more than the cost. Everything from coffee to a used car is more expensive these days, and now your music streaming service is too. Spotify announced this week that it will raise prices for U.S. subscribers—again.

item.title: Attention, la dernière mise à jour de Windows 11 peut empêcher votre PC de s’éteindre
item.description: Certains PC ne peuvent plus s'éteindre depuis la mise à jour de Windows 11 mardi dernier. Le souci a été reconnu par Microsoft, qui travaille déjà sur un correctif.

item.title: NordVPN just made it easier to browse from 30 'hard-to-reach' countries
item.description: NordVPN has expanded its server network with nearly 30 new virtual locations, granting users IP addresses in regions where physical infrastructure is scarce or insecure. Crucially, the provider is staying transparent about where those servers are actually located.

item.title: Sur TikTok, tricher sur son âge devient plus risqué en Europe
item.description: TikTok renforce sa politique de vérification de l'âge en Europe. Testée depuis un an, une technologie de détection automatisée combinant l'analyse des contenus et les comportements va être déployée dans les prochaines semaines pour empêcher les moins de 13 ans d'accéder à la plateforme.

item.title: Redwire and the power that’ll fuel NASA’s Gateway Lunar Space Station
item.description: Space company Redwire’s self-extending solar arrays are all over space. Soon, they’ll be on the station orbiting the moon. In two years, there could be a space station orbiting the moon. NASA’s Gateway Lunar Space Station, set to launch as early as 2027, will support the Artemis IV and V moon missions and, eventually, be a jumping-off point for missions to Mars. And maybe, one day, a colony....

item.title: Siri is a Gemini
item.description: We know how the next-generation Siri is supposed to work. Apple showed it off in 2024, made commercials about it, and generally promised that AI would change the way we used our gadgets forever. And then, well, none of that came to pass. So Apple made a deal: It tapped Google's Gemini technology to help […]

item.title: Arizona Man Gets 5 Years in Prison for Setting Fire to Cybertruck
item.description: Elon Musk remains at large.

item.title: French court backs LFP and orders top VPNs to block illegal football streams
item.description: A court in France has served its third blocking order against NordVPN, Surfshark, Proton VPN, ExpressVPN, and CyberGhost since May 2025, as the fight against online piracy heats up. Here's what at stake.

item.title: Soldes TV et vidéoprojecteurs : la deuxième démarque s’attaque à encore plus de modèles avec des réductions à plus de 1 000 €
item.description: Nous sommes dans le deuxième démarque des soldes d'hiver avec encore plus d'offres sur les TV 4K et les vidéoprojecteurs foisonnent chez les e-commerçants. Si l'heure est venue de changer d'écran, voici notre sélection des meilleures offres sur les TV 4K et les vidéoprojecteurs.

item.title: Our favorite 3-in-1 wireless charger is on sale for 32 percent off
item.description: Now that the winter holidays are well and truly past, now's the perfect time to take stock of your tech setup. If you were gifted (or gifted yourself) some new gear in December, make sure that you've got the proper accessories to keep that gear performing at its best. If a new way to power all those batteries would be a benefit, Amazon's currently running a discount on an excellent wireless charging pad. The UGREEN MagFlow Qi2 3-in-1 Charger Station 25W is on sale for $95. That's only a little bit above the lowest price we've ever seen for the product (which was $90), and it's still a 32 perce...

item.title: The rise of ‘micro’ apps: non-developers are writing apps instead of buying them
item.description: A new era of app creation is here. It's fun, it's fast, and it's fleeting.

item.title: Sony, Anker, and other headphones have a serious Google Fast Pair security vulnerability
item.description: Several Bluetooth audio devices from companies like Sony, Anker, and Nothing are susceptible to a new flaw that can allow attackers to listen in on conversations or track devices that use Google's Find Hub network, as reported by Wired. Researchers from KU Leuven University's Computer Security and Industrial Cryptography group in Belgium discovered several vulnerabilities […]...

item.title: Netflix will give WBD movies 45-day theater exclusivity if deal goes through
item.description: The fate of Warner Bros. Discovery remains the biggest story in Hollywood, with Paramount Skydance refusing to back down from its rival bid to the proposed Netflix acquisition of the company. If the Netflix deal does go through, the company’s co-chief executive, Ted Sarandos, has attempted to ease concerns around what that could mean for theaters. In an interview with The New York Times, Sarandos responded to a question about his company’s commitment to the theatrical business by insisting that he has no interest in bringing a swift end to it. "We will run that business largely like it is toda...

item.title: The maker of our favorite affordable wired audiophile headphones has a new mid-range model — but mid-range is relative, isn't it…
item.description: Austrian Audio fills the gap between its affordable and audiophile models

item.title: Samsung built a stunning micro-LED TV where the bezel is also a screen — and I saw it in action
item.description: Samsung's 140-inch next-gen TV shows how micro-LED can create very cool new design opportunities

item.title: Grubhub says hackers stole company data in recent breach - here's what we know
item.description: Grubhub hack is being linked to ShinyHunters and the August 2025 Salesloft Drift fiasco.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : voici les offres à saisir avant de partir en week-end
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver suivent leur chemin et nous arrivons au déjà au deuxième week-end ! Au programme : toujours plus d'offres Tech à prix cassés, que ce soient les smartphones, les tablettes, les téléviseurs 4K, et surtout les ordinateurs portables, gaming ou de bureautique. Même le gaming s'invite avec la PS5 en promo.

item.title: Meta sacrifie la VR professionnelle
item.description: Que reste-t-il du métavers ? Plus grand chose depuis l'annonce cette semaine de la charrette de licenciements au sein des Reality Labs de Meta. Mais dans le détail, la purge est pire que prévue.

item.title: Jon Bernthal Promises a ‘High Octane’ Punisher in ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’
item.description: Plus, Cate Blanchett will return for the live-action 'How to Train Your Dragon' sequel.

item.title: Why Everyone Is Suddenly in a ‘Very Chinese Time’ in Their Lives
item.description: The viral meme isn’t really about China or actual Chinese people. It's a symbol of what Americans believe their own country has lost.

item.title: Visions of Four Heroes is Dynasty Warriors Origins at its best, but issues I had with the base game remain
item.description: Dynasty Warriors Origins’ Visions of Four Heroes expansion trims the fat to deliver a near uncompromised musou experience.

item.title: What is the release date for A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms episode 1 on HBO Max?
item.description: HBO's new Game of Thrones TV adaptation comes out soon – here's when and where you can watch it.

item.title: Pink Floyd: Live at Pompeii MCMLXXII is getting the 4K Blu-ray and Dolby Atmos treatment at long last
item.description: Pink Floyd's classic concert is coming to 4K Blu-ray for the first time

item.title: Meta is closing down its VR meeting rooms as part of its wider cull
item.description: Meta is killing the standalone Workrooms app on February 16, 2026. The company presented Workrooms as a virtual reality space where teams can meet and collaborate in an immersive environment when it launched the product. Now Meta says its Horizon platform has evolved enough to support “a wide range of productivity apps and tools,” so it “made the decision to discontinue Workrooms as a standalone app.”The company recently slashed its spending on the metaverse and started the process to lay off more than 1,000 employees from its Reality Labs division. Due to those layoffs and organizational chan...

item.title: I tested ChatGPT Translate against Google Translate — here's which one wins
item.description: ChatGPT Translate challenges Google Translate in a head-to-head test

item.title: Italian regulators are investigating Activision Blizzard's monetization practices
item.description: The Italian Competition Authority (AGCM) has opened two investigations into Microsoft-owned game studio Activision Blizzard, centered around the mobile games Diablo Immortal and Call of Duty: Mobile. The AGCM alleges the free-to-play games use "misleading and aggressive practices" to encourage in-game purchases. Regulators say the games rely on a "deceptive user interface design" meant to encourage longer and more frequent play sessions while bombarding players with reminders and opportunities to spend real money in-game. Players might be reminded to buy a limited-time item before it's gone or...

item.title: Apple's latest MagSafe charger is on sale for $30
item.description:
One way you can reduce the number of cables you have to deal with on the regular is by investing in a few wireless chargers. Those with iPhones should consider Apple's own MagSafe charger not only because of its sleek and effective design, but also because it's on sale right now at Amazon. The Qi2.2-rated MagSafe charger is down to $30 for the one-meter version, or $40 for the two-meter version.
If you have an iPhone 16, iPhone 17 or iPhone Air, this cable can charge your device at 25W as long as it's connected to a 30W power adapter on the other end. While you'll need a more recent iPhone t...

item.title: Dreame has expanded its remit to 'literally anything' and I'm not sure it's good news for one of my favorite vacuum brands
item.description: From action cameras to TVs to coffee machines to smart rings, Dreame has it covered

item.title: Dans l’espace, le feu devient une sphère… et c’est un cauchemar pour les astronautes
item.description: Dans l’espace, le feu ne se comporte pas comme sur Terre. En apesanteur, la flamme se présente en effet sous une forme fascinante… mais dangereuse. Face à ce comportement atypique et au risque accru d’incendie, la Nasa et des chercheurs, comme ceux du projet Firespace, cherchent à comprendre...

item.title: Baisse de prix pour le Xpeng G6 en France, la voiture électrique rivale du Tesla Model Y qui se recharge en 12 minutes
item.description: Au royaume des SUV électriques, le Tesla Model Y est toujours le roi, mais son hégémonie est mise à mal par une concurrence de plus en plus féroce. À commencer par le Xpeng G6, qui se dote d'une nouvelle version plus abordable mais qui se recharge toujours en 12 minutes.

item.title: Idéal pour les familles, le vélo électrique Nakamura E-Cross City s’allège de 200 € lors des soldes
item.description: Le Nakamura E-Cross City, un vélo électrique que l'on pourrait qualifier de midtail, est un modèle taillé pour les familles, grâce notamment à son porte-bagages pouvant supporter jusqu'à 60 kg de charge ; parfait pour transporter un enfant, par exemple. Actuellement, on trouve ce VAE affiché à 1 099,99 euros au lieu de 1 299,99 euros pendant les soldes chez Intersport. ...

item.title: Nia DaCosta and Jack OConnell dive into 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple
item.description: Danny Boyle hands over the reins of his zombie saga to great and grateful hands with "28 Years Later: The Bone Temple," directed by Nia DaCosta.

item.title: Pixel Watch : cette nouvelle fonctionnalité d’alerte pourrait bien sauver votre journée
item.description: Google travaillerait à une nouvelle fonction d'alerte sur ses montres Pixel Watch. Elle permettrait de prévenir l'utilisateur lorsqu'il s'éloigne trop de son smartphone et risque de l'oublier.

item.title: The Jackery HomePower 3000 power station is $1,400 off at Amazon — act fast to save huge
item.description: Get the best power station deal at Amazon. Save 47% on the Jackery HomePower 3000 at Amazon.

item.title: XREAL files lawsuit against rival smart glass maker Viture
item.description: San Francisco-founded Smart glasses maker Viture has been sued in a US court by rival XREAL over claims it infringed on its patents, XREAL announced in a press release. The complaint, lodged in a federal Texas court, accuses Viture of illegally incorporating XREAL's patented tech into its products including the Luma Pro, Luma Ultra and Beast models. "The lawsuit is not merely about enforcing a single patent," the company wrote. "It is about stopping a pattern of intellectual property infringement that undermines the integrity of innovation and endangers continued technological development in ...

item.title: Dos Equis brings back the Most Interesting Man—and bets nostalgia still sells beer
item.description: Dos Equis is reviving its most iconic campaign, bringing back Jonathan Goldsmith and a familiar catchphrase. The Most Interesting Man is set to make a return to television.
